resource: 1002801.vtc=true 1002801.description=Availability and accuracy of the information provided by the navigation system, HD services or any SiriusXM services mentioned (if installed) are dependent upon many factors. Use common sense when relying on information provided. Services not available in every city or roadway. Periodic EntuneÂ® app updates do not include navigation updates. Navigation updates are available at an additional cost from your local Toyota dealer. See your Navigation System Owner's Manual or contact SiriusXM for details. 1002801.derived=false 1002801.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
